name: A walk to the library
description:
Go for a walk to the library on such a beautiful day <3

Don't let those nasty thoughts stop you from doing what you want. You CAN get outside. You CAN jump across unlikely (at best) terrain to get to the library.

Or you can hang out under the pretty tree and listen to the music, that works too.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

My entry to the GMTK 2021 game jam

There are loads of features I'd love to tweak (like a proper ending ^.^') but it's almost 4am in New Zealand and I need to go to bed.

Such is jamming.

Considering some hiccups, I think it turned out really well.

Mild content warning for depression and eyes. It's all very gamey though.

Because I didn't get credits into the game, I'll put them here:

  o  Love2D by Love World domination inc.

  o  Batteries library and some much valued help by Max Cahill

  o  Pixellari font by Zaccary Dempsey-Plante

  o  Music made in Musagi

  o  And the rest by me! Lily "Hexalotyl" Cahill

All in all, I'm pretty happy with what I was able to do this (mostly) solo. Very proud of this one.

Much love, and wish me luck!!!
